title: ULINE Mail Preferences
description: Have your customers use this link for ULINE Catalogs.

title: Time Conversion Table
description: An internal tool for converting standard time to postal (military and hundredths) time.

title: VEHICLE SAFETY CHECK
description: U.S. POSTAL SERVICE EXPANDED VEHICLE SAFETY CHECK.

title: NALC Official Website
description: The official website for the National Association of Letter Carriers.

title: NALC Joint Contract Administration Manual (JCAM)
description: Access the Joint Contract Administration Manual (JCAM) directly from the NALC website. This is a primary resource for understanding the National Agreement.(Note: 2022)

title: NALC National Agreement
description: Direct link to the PDF of the current National Agreement between NALC and USPS. (Note: 2023-2026).

title: NALC Resources
description: Resources for all City Carriers. This is VERY useful!

title: NALC City Carrier Assistant (CCA) Resources
description: Resources specifically for City Carrier Assistants, including pay, benefits, and conversion information.

title: NALC Retirement Department
description: Information and resources related to retirement benefits for letter carriers.

title: NALC Health Benefit Plan
description: Official website for the NALC Health Benefit Plan.

title: NALC Postal Record (Magazine)
description: Online archives of The Postal Record, NALC's monthly magazine.

title: NALC News & Updates
description: Latest news and updates from the National Association of Letter Carriers.

title: NRLCA Official Website
description: The official website for the National Rural Letter Carriers' Association. Note: Direct access to some content may require membership.

title: NRLCA-USPS National Agreement (2024-2027)
description: Access to the PDF of the 2024-2027 National Agreement between NRLCA and USPS. This is a primary resource for rural carriers.

title: NRLCA Stewards' Quick Reference Guide
description: A quick reference guide for NRLCA stewards. Note: This is an older version. The NRLCA website (www.nrlca.org) is stated to have the most current version under 'Steward Operations' then 'Reference Guide'.

title: The National Rural Letter Carrier (Official Magazine)
description: The official monthly magazine of the NRLCA, providing members with information on postal and legislative matters. Available to members, typically through the official website or physical mail.
